Package org.apache.fop.afp.modca

Contains a collection of AFP Mixed Object Document Content Architecture (MO:DCA) structured objects.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AbstractAFPObject.Category structured field category codes
AbstractAFPObject.Type structured field type codes
 

Class Summary
AbstractAFPObject This is the base class for all data stream objects.
AbstractDataObject Abstract base class used by the ImageObject and GraphicsObject which both have define an ObjectEnvironmentGroup
AbstractDescriptor Base class for AFP descriptor objects
AbstractEnvironmentGroup A base class that encapsulates common features of ActiveEnvironmentGroup and ResourceEnvironmentGroup
AbstractNamedAFPObject This is the base class for all named data stream objects.
AbstractPageObject Pages contain the data objects that comprise a presentation document.
AbstractResourceEnvironmentGroupContainer An abstract class which encapsulates the common features of Document and PageGroup resource containers
AbstractResourceGroupContainer An abstract container of resource objects
AbstractStructuredObject An abstract class encapsulating an MODCA structured object
AbstractTripletStructuredObject A MODCA structured object base class providing support for Triplets
ActiveEnvironmentGroup An Active Environment Group (AEG) is associated with each page, and is contained in the page's begin-end envelope in the data stream.
ContainerDataDescriptor Container data descriptor (to maintain compatibility with pre-year 2000 applications)
Document The document is the highest level of the MO:DCA data-stream document component hierarchy.
GraphicsDataDescriptor GOCA Graphics Data Descriptor
GraphicsObject Top-level GOCA graphics object.
ImageDataDescriptor ImageDataDescriptor
ImageObject An IOCA Image Data Object
IMImageObject An IM image data object specifies the contents of a raster image and its placement on a page, overlay, or page segment.
IncludedResourceObject Encapsulates an included resource object that is loaded from an external file.
IncludeObject An Include Object structured field references an object on a page or overlay.
IncludePageOverlay The Include Page Overlay structured field references an overlay resource definition that is to be positioned on the page.
IncludePageSegment The Include Page Segment structured field references a page segment resource object that is to be presented on the page or overlay presentation space.
InterchangeSet MO:DCA Interchange Set
InvokeMediumMap The Invoke Medium Map structured field identifies the Medium Map that is to become active for the document.
MapCodedFont The Map Coded Font structured field maps a unique coded font resource local ID, which may be embedded one or more times within an object's data and descriptor, to the identifier of a coded font resource object.
MapContainerData The Map Container Data structured field specifies how a presentation data object that is carried in an Object Container is mapped into its object area.
MapDataResource The Map Data Resource structured field specifies resources that are required for presentation.
MapImageObject The Map Image Object (MIO) structured field specifies how an image data object is mapped into its object area.
MapPageOverlay The Map Page Overlay structured field maps a Resource Local ID to the name of a Begin Overlay structured field.
MapPageSegment The Map Page Segment structured field identifies page segments that are required to present a page on a physical medium.
NoOperation The No Operation structured field may be used to carry comments or any other type of unarchitected data.
ObjectAreaDescriptor The Object Area Descriptor structured field specifies the size and attributes of an object area presentation space.
ObjectAreaPosition The Object Area Position structured field specifies the origin and orientation of the object area, and the origin and orientation of the object content within the object area.
ObjectContainer Object containers are MO:DCA objects that envelop and carry object data.
ObjectEnvironmentGroup An Object Environment Group (OEG) may be associated with an object and is contained within the object's begin-end envelope.
Overlay An overlay is a MO:DCA-P resource object.
PageDescriptor The Page Descriptor structured field specifies the size and attributes of a page or overlay presentation space.
PageGroup A page group is used in the data stream to define a named, logical grouping of sequential pages.
PageObject Pages contain the data objects that comprise a presentation document.
PageSegment A page segment is a MO:DCA-P resource object.
PreprocessPresentationObject The Preprocess Presentation Object structured field specifies presentation parameters for a data object that has been mapped as a resource.
PresentationEnvironmentControl The Presentation Environment Control structured field specifies parameters that affect the rendering of presentation data and the appearance that is to be assumed by the presentation device.
PresentationTextData Presentation text data contains the graphic characters and the control sequences necessary to position the characters within the object space.
PresentationTextDescriptor The Presentation Text Descriptor specifies the units of measure for the Presentation Text object space, the size of the Presentation Text object space, and the initial values for modal parameters, called initial text conditions.
PresentationTextObject The Presentation Text object is the data object used in document processing environments for representing text which has been prepared for presentation.
Registry MOD:CA Registry of object types
ResourceEnvironmentGroup A Resource Environment Group contains a set of resources for a document or for a group of pages in a document.
ResourceGroup A Resource Group contains a set of overlays.
ResourceObject This resource structured field begins an envelope that is used to carry resource objects in print-file-level (external) resource groups.
StreamedResourceGroup A print-file resource group
TagLogicalElement A Tag Logical Element structured field assigns an attribute name and an attribute value to a page or page group.
TagLogicalElementBean The TagLogicalElementBean provides a bean for holding the attributes of a tag logical element as key value pairs.
 

Enum Summary
AxisOrientation Represents the 4 bytes that specify the axis-area rotation reference coordinate system
Rotation Represents a rotation value
 

Exception Summary
MaximumSizeExceededException An exception to handle maximum sizes being exceeded.
 

Package org.apache.fop.afp.modca Description

Contains a collection of AFP Mixed Object Document Content Architecture (MO:DCA) structured objects.
